features.featureTitle: Replace the existing celebration photo assets by overwriting the static files at `frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-photo-1.jpg` and `frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-photo-2.jpg` with the two newly uploaded images, keeping the exact same target filenames so the UI continues to reference stable paths.

Harden the `CelebrationPhoto` component so transient load/decode timing issues do not permanently force the error fallback; implement an automatic retry path (without user interaction) before showing the error state, while keeping all user-facing text unchanged.
